values.value:
Dear Customer,
We acknowledge your booking with Runwal. In order to move to the next steps of your booking journey we request you to kindly clear the initial 5% of your agreement value. Post the clearance of the initial 5% of agreement value from your end we will initiate a call with our representative to take you through the further steps of your booking Journey.
We thank you for choosing Runwal to be your preferred partner to deliver your dream home.
Regards, Runwal Group
